summary: Bonifacio is 27 years old and he is roaming about Venice. He is trying to decide whether to accept a job or not. In so doing, he recalls all his past life: his love story with Gabriella, ... See full summary »
cast: Sady Rebbot|Pascale Audret|Nando Angelini|Andreina Carli|Gino Cavalieri|Franco Arcalli|Piero Vida|Enzo Nigro|Tino Buazzelli|Carletto Chia|Giuseppe Cosentino|Monique Messine
title: Chi lavora è perduto (In capo al mondo)
